  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_90842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Roches plutoniques : le basalte</string>
            <string language="en">Igneous rocks: basalt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eruptivgesteine: Basalt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rochas igneous: basalt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rocce eruttive: basalto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πύρινοι βράχοι: βασάλτης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rocas ígneas: basalto</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur deux illustrations montrant les  roches plutoniques qui se forment sur la surface de la terre. Ceci  montre un morceau de basalte ayant de petits cristaux.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing igneous rocks that form on the Earth's surface. This shows a piece of basalt having small crystals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">basalte</string>
            <string language="en">basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se refroidissant</string>
            <string language="en">cooling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cristaux</string>
            <string language="en">crystals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches  plutoniques</string>
            <string language="en">igneous rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
Eruptivgesteine zeigen, die auf der Oberfläche der Masse sich bilden.
Dieses zeigt ein Stück des Basalts, der kleine Kristalle hat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram as 
rochas igneous que dão forma na superfície da terra. Isto 
mostra uma parte de basalt que tem cristais pequenos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano le rocce eruttive che formano sulla superficie della terra. 
Ciò mostra una parte del basalto che ha piccoli cristalli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πύρινους 
βράχους που διαμορφώνουν στη γήινη επιφάνεια. Αυτό 
εμφανίζει ένα κομμάτι του βασάλτη που έχει τα μικρά κρύσταλλα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que muestran
las rocas ígneas que forman en la superficie de la tierra. Esto
muestra un pedazo del basalto que tiene cristales pequeños.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Basalt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abkühlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
